verses.name: Genesis 9:4
verses.text: But flesh with the life thereof, which is the blood thereof, shall ye not eat.

verses.name: Genesis 9:5
verses.text: And surely your blood of your lives will I require; at the hand of every beast will I require it, and at the hand of man; at the hand of every man’s brother will I require the life of man.

verses.name: Genesis 9:6
verses.text: Whoso sheddeth man’s blood, by man shall his blood be shed: for in the image of God made he man.

verses.name: Genesis 9:7
verses.text: And you, be ye fruitful, and multiply; bring forth abundantly in the earth, and multiply therein.
